title.narrative: CHILDREN & YOUTH PARTICIPATION

description.narrative: Children and youth enabled to participate in the decision-making process, which contributes to Adolescents And Hiv/Aids, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2017 , there is a government-endorsed roadmap for the overall changes required to reform health and social protection systems necessary to realize the rights of the most vulnerable children, adolescents, women and families.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Children and youth enabled to participate in the decision-making process

description.narrative: Sustainable platforms where children and adolescents express their view on issues of their concern are established. U-Report, community-based centers, online platform for HIV-positive adolescents and U-Ambassadors initiative enable participation of children and adolescents increasingly recognized by the decision-makers and society as valuable to shape the future of their country. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:23/12/2017

title.narrative: Sustainable platform(s) where children and adolescents express their view on issues of concern to them are established and warrant that views of children are increasingly recognized by the GoU and Ukrainian society, as valuable to shape the future of their country.

target.value: 2017:Platforms are established and functional: U-Report, community based centres, online platform for HIV positive adolescents, etc.

title.narrative: National HIV/AIDS strategies that include proven high-impact evidence-based interventions to address HIV among adolescents available
